remarks: Version of ~ cases expressed using ` if- ` .  Case disjunction according to the value of ` ph ` .  One can see this as a proof that the two hypotheses characterize the conditional operator for propositions. (Contributed by BJ, 20-Sep-2019.)
statement:
casesifp.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
casesifp.2 $e |- ( -. ph -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
casesifp $p |- ( ps <-> if- ( ph , ch , th ) ) $.
